title: Salutem in Christo
author: R. G., fl. 1571.
notes: Signed and dated: At London the. xiij. of October. 1571. Your louyng brother in lawe. R.G., i.e. Richard Grafton? William Cecil, Baron Burghley?.
Concerning the second commitment of Thomas Howard, Duke of Norfolk, to the Tower.
Text begins: Good men and euill delite in contraryes.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
In this edition, A3r line 16 ends: euil.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
